Quiz
AIzaSyBi50vULcwsdebpsILZxQ9lyX6L6Oxc3kA
For each of the following questions rate yourself from one to five, one being on the left and five being on the right
Little interest or pleasure in doing things
Feeling down, depressed, or hopeless
Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much
Feeling tired or having little energy
Poor appetite or overeating
Feeling bad about yourself or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down
Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television
Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed. Or the opposite being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual
Thoughts that you would be better off dead, or of hurting yourself
How close are you to getting the recommended daily water intake? (The recommended water intake for a man is 15 cups, 11 for a woman)
How would you rate your activity for today
How close do you think you are to the recommended hours of sleep (Recommended hours of sleep (for ages 13–18) 8–10 hours, ( for ages 18++) 7++ hours)
How would you rate your eating consistency?
How many servings of fruits/veggies have you had today?
